name: Penguini
description:
What a magical world Penguini inhabits!

Unfortunately, the cheeky seagulls keep stealing his eggs and flying off with them. He must rescue them before they fall into the sea.

Not being able to fly, Penguini bounces backwards and forwards between icebergs, so it doesn't help that his habitat is melting.

He must also avoid the polar bears - unless the mythical Magical Seal can be found who is the bearer of the Shield of Invincibility!

He needs your help! Are you up to the challenge?

With Game Center integration, track your progress on the global leaderboard and see if you can attain all 13 achievements.

Now with iPad and iOS 5 support!
